channel.title: John Waller and Carl Boettiger on GBIF Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in John Waller and Carl Boettiger on GBIF Data Blog

item.title: Using Apache Arrow and Parquet with GBIF-mediated occurrences
item.description: As written about in a previous blog post, GBIF now has database snapshots of occurrence records on AWS. This allows users to access large tables of GBIF-mediated occurrence records from Amazon s3 remote storage. This access is free of charge.
